You say hello to a black haired boy, who introduces himself as Jack Warner. As you chat you find that both his parents went to Hogwarts, and he seems to know a lot more about what to expect. He reassures you that, it will all be okay, and soon you find yourselves in the Grand Hall.

As you head to the front of the hall you see a rather scruffy hat sitting on a stool. Despite its scruffy appearance, it seems to have the most people looking at it. You watch quietly with Jack, as the new students are called up one at a time, and the hat is placed on their head by the Head master, that Jack respectfully calls Dumbledore.

He looks a little mad, but harmless to you. As your fellow students are assigned a house, a cheer echoes from the table to welcome the new member. Finally your name is called, and you timidly walk up the few steps and sit on the stool. Dumbledore places the hat on your head, and time seems to slow down for you. You hear the voice of the sorting hat in your head, and as your eyes dart about, you notice that only you can hear the voice.

"I know your secret, Alex." The voice lets that thought hang for a second. "Now, where should I put you."

"Not in Slytherin, I'm sure you wouldn't like that one, but I'm not sure you'd like Gryffindor either. You're smart enough, to hide your interests."

In a loud voice it declares "Ravenclaw."

The voice talks to you inside your head again, "Drink the minty green potion, your mother packed you tonight. You'll like...." and the voice vanishes as Dumbledore lifts the hat off your head. Rapturous applause is coming from the Ravenclaw table, as you head over there, a smile crosses your face. When you sit down, all those around you shake your hand and introduce themselves. You watch the rest of the ceremony with rapt attention, your soul feeling joyously happy.

info.description:
Hey!
In this interactive, you take on the life of any Hogwarts student, existing or created, male or female.
You acquire an unlimited amount of Polyjuice Potion, but it isn't ordinary - if you change into any living, breathing thing, you have 1 hour. Anything else, 1 day. Plants are in the anything else category.

Rules:
you may turn into anything, literally!
no swearing
sex is allowed
stay on topic!!!

Otherwise, have fun!
